formal_name:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold:
The Fafnir Knight Update Ver. 1.1
description: This is an update for the Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold: The Fafnir Knight.
name:
Etrian Odyssey 2 Untold:
The Fafnir Knight Update
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
